title: User Authentication with 2FA and Social Login
description: Verify that users can successfully login using email and password with 2FA enabled, and also via supported social login methods.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid email and password credentials
Complete second factor authentication using valid 2FA code
Click login button
Verify user is successfully logged in and directed to the dashboard
Logout
Select social login option (Google/Facebook/other supported)
Verify user is authenticated via social login and redirected correctly
Attempt login with incorrect password
Verify login fails with appropriate error message
Attempt login with invalid 2FA code
Verify login fails and error is shown for 2FA

title: Patient Registration and Duplicate CPF Prevention
description: Ensure patients can be registered with valid CPF and that duplicate CPFs are prevented with appropriate validation.

steps.description: Navigate to patient registration form
Input valid patient data with a valid unique CPF
Upload valid supporting media files securely
Submit patient registration form
Verify patient is registered successfully and data is saved
Attempt to register another patient with the same CPF
Verify registration fails and duplicate CPF error is shown
Input invalid CPF format
Verify form validation prevents submission and displays CPF format error

title: Appointment Scheduling with Conflict Prevention and Recurrence
description: Verify appointment booking works correctly, prevents conflicts, and supports recurring appointment setup.

steps.description: Navigate to appointment scheduling module
Attempt to book an appointment within available time slots
Verify appointment is successfully booked and appears in calendar views
Attempt to book an overlapping appointment for the same physiotherapist
Verify system prevents booking and displays conflict warning
Book a recurring appointment series with daily frequency for one week
Verify all recurring appointments are created correctly without conflicts
Visualize appointments in daily, weekly, monthly, and list views
Verify all views correctly display scheduled appointments

title: Clinical Documentation Editor Features
description: Validate rich text editing, auto-save, version history, and customizable templates in clinical SOAP notes editor.

steps.description: Open clinical documentation editor for a patient
Enter SOAP note content using rich text features
Verify formatting options apply correctly (bold, italic, lists, etc.)
Wait for auto-save interval or trigger manual save
Verify content auto-saves without data loss
Access version history
Verify previous document versions are listed and restorations work
Apply a customizable template to new documentation
Verify template content loads correctly and can be modified

title: AI Assistant Functionality Accuracy and Integration
description: Ensure AI assistant correctly generates clinical reports, treatment suggestions, risk analysis, and financial insights with high accuracy.

steps.description: Provide clinical data input to AI assistant
Request automatic clinical report (laudo) generation
Verify generated report meets at least 95% accuracy compared to expert report
Request AI suggested treatment protocols for given patient
Verify suggestions are relevant and clinically appropriate
Request risk analysis on patient clinical data
Verify risk analysis output is consistent with known risk factors
Request financial insights from AI assistant
Verify insights reflect accurate financial metrics

title: Exercise Library Multimedia and Safety Alerts
description: Verify that the exercise library supports multimedia content and issues safety alerts for contraindications.

steps.description: Browse exercise library and open exercise with video and image content
Verify multimedia content loads and plays correctly
Prescribe exercise to patient with known contraindication
Verify system triggers safety alert warning about contraindications
Prescribe exercise without contraindications
Verify no safety alert is triggered and prescription saves successfully

title: Patient Portal Secure Access and Data Views
description: Test secure patient login and ability to view personal data, prescriptions, appointments, and communicate with clinic.

steps.description: Login to patient portal using valid patient credentials
Verify secure authentication and access is granted
Navigate to personal data section
Verify personal clinical data is correctly displayed and access is restricted to the logged-in patient
View prescriptions and exercises assigned
Verify accurate exercise lists with relevant multimedia display
Manage upcoming appointments
Verify appointments can be viewed and canceled if allowed
Send and receive messages with clinic staff
Verify communication channel is secure and messages are delivered

title: Financial Transactions and Multi-Payment Integration
description: Validate accurate recording of financial transactions and integration with multiple payment methods.

steps.description: Create a new financial transaction with valid data
Verify transaction is recorded with correct amounts, dates, and linked patient or service
Process payment using credit card integration
Verify payment is successful and recorded
Process payment using alternative payment methods (e.g., PIX, bank transfer)
Verify payment status updates and transactions log reflects the payment method
Generate revenue report from financial module
Verify report accuracy and data consistency

title: System Compliance with LGPD and Data Protection
description: Ensure the system enforces LGPD data protection measures including user data encryption, access control, and user data deletion requests.

steps.description: Review encryption mechanisms for stored personal data
Verify data at rest and in transit are encrypted
Attempt to access patient data with unauthorized user
Verify access is denied
Submit a data deletion request on behalf of patient
Verify data is removed or anonymized according to policy and user is notified
Check audit logs for data access and modification
Verify logs are complete and immutable

title: Notification and Reminders Handling
description: Validate that notifications and reminders for appointments, tasks, and alerts are triggered and delivered in real-time.

steps.description: Schedule an appointment and configure notification settings
Verify notification is sent at scheduled time via configured channels
Create a high-priority task with due date
Verify user receives task reminder notification
Trigger alert for inventory stock below threshold
Verify alert notification is generated and received by responsible users

title: Interactive Body Pain Mapping Functionality
description: Verify the interactive body map allows users to mark pain points, scale intensity, and save the information correctly tied to patient records.

steps.description: Open interactive body map for a patient
Mark multiple pain points on different body areas
Set pain intensity scale for each point
Save pain mapping data
Verify pain points and intensities are stored and persist on revisit
Edit an existing pain point and save changes
Verify updates are reflected correctly in patient clinical record

title: System Performance under 3G Network Conditions
description: Verify that pages load within 2 seconds under simulated 3G network latency to ensure performance targets are met.

steps.description: Simulate 3G network conditions using network throttling tools
Navigate through major pages such as dashboard, patient list, appointment scheduling, and reports
Measure page load time ensuring loads complete within 2 seconds

title: Backup Multi-Cloud Automated Backup Verification
description: Verify that automated backups are successfully created and stored across configured cloud providers with appropriate logging.

steps.description: Trigger automated backup process
Verify backup files are created and stored in multiple cloud destinations
Check logs for backup success messages and error absence
Verify logs record accurate timestamps and status
